name: LeBronJamesFunFacts
0:
”Alexa, open lebron james fun facts”
”Alexa, ask lebron james fun facts to tell me a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lebron james fun facts
des:
LeBron Raymone James Sr. is an American professional basketball player for the Los Angeles Lakers of the National Basketball Association (NBA). Often considered the best basketball player in the world and regarded by some as the greatest player of all time.

This Alexa skill will present some cool and intersting facts about James' life and achievments.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
